timeline.body: nit: can we use a `Executors.newSingleThreadScheduledExecutor()` and `.scheduleWithFixedDelay(...)` instead? Feel free to ignore, not sure what's the idiomatic way to achieve this.

timeline.body:
Feel free to ignore this suggestion
```suggestion
        Thread.sleep(java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMillis(15));
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Feel free to ignore this suggestion

Suggested change
Thread.sleep(15000);
Thread.sleep(java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMillis(15));
